attributes.action: intervene to ensure Iranian peace talks with US are not suspended - peaceably incarcerate Shi'ite militias and deal only with govt representatives given Iranian reluctance to join security talks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Iran has said it will not hold a new round of talks with the US on security in Iraq until American forces end their current assault against Shiite militias.
Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman Mohammad Ali Hosseini's announcement is the first official confirmation that the talks will be suspended.
Iran's semi-official Fars news agency quoted an unnamed senior Iranian negotiator on Saturday as saying new talks were not possible with continued US attacks against the Iraqi people.
US and Iraqi forces have been battling supporters of radical Shiite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr. We the undersigned want peace in this region and no more injuries and mortalities.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
